vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μαάθ, ὁ
indecl.,
Maath: Luk.3:26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26;
son of: Mattathias (G3161H);
father of: Naggai (G3477)
§ Maath, "to be small"
Maath, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:26*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪押 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "小"
瑪他提亞的兒子，在耶穌的家譜中 (路 3:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛押 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "小"
玛他提亚的儿子，在耶稣的家谱中 (路 3:26)
